name: A Leaf on The Water
description:
If you are unable to control the game, refresh the page and try again without scrolling or doing anything outside of the game. Unfortunately this bug seems to be a result of the way itch.io embeds games in the browser.

Game by Bryce Newbury.

Sound effects by Blender Foundation.

The song is Breadtime by Lifeformed.

The source code for the game is available on GitHub.
